message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $115. Would you be willing to meet me at $112?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $118. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $114?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $116. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that I might not be able to get the price I want, but I'm still really interested in the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $113?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'll offer it to you for $115. It's a fair price, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?

I've made a few concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at $113, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to accept that, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.
